thread.title: Paul Maritz Steps Down as Pivotal CEO
thread.title_full: Paul Maritz Steps Down as Pivotal CEO - WSJ

author: Robert McMillan
title: Paul Maritz Steps Down as Pivotal CEO
text:
Paul Maritz is stepping down as CEO at Pivotal Software Inc., a data analytics, cloud computing and software-development services company spun out of EMC Corp. and VMware Inc. Mr. Maritz has held the job since 2012, when the company began in stealth mode.
He will be succeeded by Rob Mee, who co-founded Pivotal Labs, a software development firm...
